adDetails: Do you want your floor installed by the best at the lowest price? A licensed flooring contractor is installing, repairing, re-finishing all kinds of hardwood flooring including laminated and engineered floors. We also install hardwood stairs and railings. Ceramic tile, cork and resilient flooring installed if required. Residential and Commercial. We will match the lowest rate on the market! Please see the pictures attached or look at examples of our work and CALL US TODAY for a FREE ESTIMATE! Phone show contact info.
